title.rendered: Macallan 1967 Sir Peter Blake – Down to Work Limited Edition

excerpt.rendered:
This is a Macallan 1967 Limited Edition Collaboration with Sir Peter Blake as part of the Anecdotes of Ages Collection. This whisky wears an artistic label named as Down to Work. Bottled at 46.7% abv, this beautiful bottle is housed in an artistic presentation. A squirrel is laser etched on a removable panel, revealing a thumbnail photography collage documenting Sir Peter’s journey with The Macallan for the creation of this collection. On the side a sliding drawer features Sir Peter’s signature laser etched into the oak. Within is a leather bound book sustainably sourced in Scotland, revealing the 13 unique stories behind the full Anecdotes of Ages Collection.

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Vintage : 1967
ABV : 46.70%
